Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: SVT job has been configured as a cron job in CI. https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/me/my-views/view/All/job/fabric-test-svt-x86_64/ There are couple of issues addressed in patchset.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: You are correct. To run the OTE tests in the fabric-test repo, the fabric repo needs to be cloned too, in order to build the OTE tool and run the tests. What is your question?

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: You answered my question.. When we don't build images, we don't clone fabric repo.. That's the reason the OTE tests are failing. ~sambhavdutt will work on this change to update CI config.
